extension.name: Log Lop
extension.description: Provides scheduled task to prevent job logs growing indefinitely by lopping off logs older than a configured length of time, e.g. 1 month, 1 year. After installing go to /civicrm/admin/loglop to enable.
extension.comments: This is a new module. It looks safe to me, but I'm not promising it won't delete all your logs. Have a look a the code and use it if you like the look of it. PRs welcome.
